credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Two Friezes Featuring Candelabra, Trophies and Putti
medium: Black chalk on off white laid paper
description: Friezes featuring candelabrum, in center between two symmetrically disposed rams. Trophy of non-military objects. Frieze below. At left, altar beside genius holding torch.  Sphinx and griffon sitting with backs toward each other, crossed tails. Above, putto flying seizing wing of sphinx. At right, torso of woman with head, springing from leaves.
name: Drawing
